name: Gone Haywire
description:
A deckbuilding roguelike where the robot you are controlling has gone haywire, and it acts for itself! Luckily, you get to control the enemies instead and build decks for them as well. Make the worst decision possible at every point and you just may survive the dungeon.

Note: The downloaded versions require Java to run. If you don't have Java installed, please run the web version (or install Java).

Art assets:

  • https://opengameart.org/content/fantasy-monster-animal-sprites for the monster sprites (Division Plus)
  • https://opengameart.org/content/robot-0 for the robot sprite (Hannah Cohan, from PlatForge)

No sound in game, so feel free to play some music.
